items.title: It's harder to get home insurance. That's changing communities across the U.S.

• Insurance costs are also rising because people are moving to coastal regions vulnerable to hurricanes and forested areas

items.title: Jupiter’s wild youth may have reshaped the entire Solar System
bullets: • Jupiter's rapid growth disrupted the early solar system, creating rings where new planetesimals formed much later than expected
• These late-forming bodies match the ages and chemistry of chondrite meteorites found on Earth
• The findings also help explain why Earth and the other rocky planets remained near 1 AU rather than plunging inward

items.title: Hackers use Anthropic’s AI model Claude once again
bullets: • Anthropic announced that Chinese state-backed hackers used the company’s AI model Claude to automate roughly 30 attacks on corporations and governments during a September campaign
